text:
[Verse]
Underneath the stars we lie
Whispers float into the sky
Hold my hand and don't let go
In your eyes our secrets glow

[Verse 2]
Shadows dance in moon's embrace
Silence fills this hidden space
Heartbeat echoes in the night
Love's a fire burning bright

[Chorus]
Midnight whispers in the air
Feel the magic everywhere
Holding tight through summer breeze
Lost in moments like these

[Verse 3]
Footsteps on the velvet sand
Dreams unfolding
Hand in hand
Nighttime stories softly spin
History we create begins

[Bridge]
City lights they fade away
In your arms I want to stay
Every second feels so real
In this world our hearts reveal

[Verse 4]
Unseen worlds lit by our flame
Wishing stars we call their names
Journey deep into the mist
Finding solace in your kiss
title: Midnight Whispers
